title: The 2014 Techy Awards
headline: The 2014 Techy Awards
description: Gather around, gearheads, for the second-annual Technology Awards, aka "The Techies." Golf innovation is moving at the speed of Rory McIlroy's downswing. Here are some of the golfers and gadgets leading the charge to modernize our tradition-steeped game.
body: Gather around, gearheads, for the second-annual Technology Awards, aka "The Techies." Golf innovation is moving at the speed of Rory McIlroy's downswing. Here are some of the golfers and gadgets leading the charge to modernize our tradition-steeped game.
